title: Patch Notes
content: a bug where using the Mould Chamber in Grymforge while in combat would prevent you from moving. Fixed a potential crash in Felogyr's Fireworks on Avery's turn in combat. Fixed a potential crash due to the game script requesting combat from a character that isn't loaded into the region. Fixed a crash that could occur during the cutscene that triggers when you reach the Netherbrain. Fixed a potential crash when switching between keyboard and mouse and controller during a dice roll. Fixed a crash
